text: Mai telekai Dimaadua, Aaron tangada hai mee dabu gaa gaga gi tomo di Gonduu Hor. Nia ngadau o maa gu lau madalua maa dolu (123), gei mee gaa made i golo i tahi laangi o di lima malama o di madahaa ngadau i muli di hagatanga digau Israel i Egypt.33.38-39 Numbers 20.22-28; Deuteronomy 10.6; 32.50
